String Transforms
========================================================
```{r}
# Reverser
Reverser <- function(x) {
letters -> strsplit(x, "")[[1]]
R <- letters[rev(1:nchar(x))]
paste(R, collapse="")
}
```
```{r}
# Reverser Test
Reverser("world")
Reverser("Ibrahima")
Reverser("Computer")
```{r}
# Scrambler
Scrambler <- function(x) {
letters -> strsplit(x, "")[[1]]
R <- letters[sample(1:nchar(x))]
paste(R, collapse="")
}
```{r}
# Scrambler test
Scrambler("love")
Scrambler("Senegal")
Scrambler("Minnesota")
```
```{r}
VowelBleeper
VowelBleeper <- function(x) {
letters -> strsplit(x, "")
Vowels <- c("e","o","a","e","i","y")
R <- gsub(Vowels, "*", x)
paste(R, collapse="")}
```{r}
# VowelBleeper test
VowelBleeper("computer")
